## OverflowState.horizontalScrollBarHasGutter property

Does the horizontal scroll bar have a gutter (reserved space)?

**Signature:**

```typescript
horizontalScrollBarHasGutter: boolean;
```

## Remarks

Overlay scroll bars will never have a gutter; classic scroll bars will have a gutter if the scrollable element has overflow.
